page.title: 11HOUSING_MY ROAD.
page.content:
I LIVE ON OTLEY OLD ROAD.IT IS A VERY LONG ROAD,AND HAS A MAIN BUS ROUTE TO LEEDS.THERE IS ALWAYS A LOT OF TRAFFIC POLICE CARS,AMBULNCES AND FIRE ENGINS SPEEDING PAST.THE POLICE CARS COME FROM WEETWOOD POLICE STATION AND THE AMBULANCES COME FROM COOKRIDGE HOSPITAL.ON ONE SIDE OF MY ROAD THERE ARE LOTS OF TREES.THERE IS ALSO A Y.M.C.A WHERE YOU CAN PLAY TENNIS.THE VERGES IN FRONT OF THE HOUSES ARE VERY WIDE AND EVERY SO OFTEN A MAN COMES ALONG ON A TRACTOR TO CUT THE GRASS. THE HOUSES ARE ALL SEMIDETACHED.THEY ARE VERY BIG AND THEY ALL HAVE 4 BEDROOMS AND A BIG GARDEN WE HAVE A LOT OF NICE BIRDS IN OUR GARDEN INCLUDING BLACKBIRDS,SPARROWS,BLUETITS GREATTITS,YELLOWHAMMERS,GREENFINCHES AND BLUEFINCHES
BY {CATHERINE DALE AGE9
